name: BANKSTOWN FLYING SCHOOL PTY LTD
about: Bankstown Flying School, established in 2016, is the exclusive NSW flight training facility for Cirrus Aircraft. Located at Bankstown Airport, we offer a range of courses from Recreational Pilot Licence (RPL) to Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL), including advanced training in NVFR, IFR, and MECIR. Our team, led by CEO and Flight Instructor Nige Clark, boasts over 10,000 hours of flight experience and includes two in-house flight examiners and several Cirrus Specialised Instructor Pilots. As a Cirrus Platinum Partner, we uphold the highest standards in flight training, emphasizing safety and culture. We provide transparent pricing and flexible scheduling to accommodate our students' needs, ensuring a fun and safe learning environment. Join us to start your flying journey and potentially fly around Australia or globally.
